message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a unique product for $100. As a seller, I want to assure you that I've had a great track record so far, with 1 out of 1 product sold being high-quality. I'm confident that this one will be just as great! Would you like to take a chance and see for yourself?
I trust your track record and am willing to take the chance on this product.

However, I want to be transparent with you - my last two products didn't quite meet my usual standards. I'm hoping this one will be a return to form! Would you like to take a chance on it?
I trust your expertise, Alice. Let's hope this one meets the high-quality standard.
